html:
12.26.18  6:00 pm   Is your shift key broken?

     Why do you never use capitals?

when i do
12.26.18  5:36 pm   another advise question: any advice on gathering the motivation to learn music theory, e.g. keys, relationships between chords, chord progs? any tricks?
12.26.18  5:19 pm   Why do humans breath oxygen?
12.26.18  5:14 pm   i miss my friends where did they go
12.26.18  4:20 pm   What is the last song you listened to?
12.26.18  4:08 pm   how did you feel when you first realized how many people watch your videos?

12.26.18  3:53 pm   I know you produce content based on whatever you feel like doing. But do you ever sway in the direction of what people want?

      Do you have opinions on producing to satisfy fans vs satisfying your own creativity?
12.26.18  3:46 pm   I want to write but I don't know how to get my words out. What do I do?
12.26.18  3:21 pm   What is your biggest regret in life?
12.26.18  3:02 pm   how does one stay productive without relying on internal fear
12.26.18  2:47 pm   can you do a good think next?
12.26.18  2:29 pm   how many medium things have u done
12.26.18  2:03 pm   Do you plan a video and then shoot, or do you shoot a bunch of footage and then see what you can do with it?
12.26.18  1:47 pm   do you approve of violent head shaking?
12.26.18  1:26 pm   I have a theory that you're a music major and your videos are just assignments that got popular and so you started to do more. Am i right?
12.26.18  1:15 pm   ever considered making jingles and music for companies?
12.26.18  12:46 pm   Any tips for picking up harmonies by ear?
12.26.18  12:14 pm   How do you feel about people inferring things about you from the lyrics of your songs?
12.26.18  11:41 am   i think therefore i am but who am i?
12.26.18  11:27 am   have you considered designing more shirts?
12.26.18  10:29 am   what is your favorite book right now at this current place and time
12.26.18  10:24 am   how many questions that are asked are featured on your questions page?
12.26.18  9:57 am   why am i me and not someone else
12.26.18  9:44 am   Have you ever tried to write melodies and lyrics after you've written the instrumental? This is the order in which I write lately and it can be a fun challenge to make it all fit
12.26.18  9:38 am   help!! how can i cure my no personality syndrome?

12.26.18  9:10 am   I feel you could probably make a really good progressive rock composition and/or album. Do you have any ideas or concepts that you are willing to try out or experiment with that fits along these lines? (Doesn't have to be limited to prog, of course.)
12.26.18  9:04 am   Is 0=0 the world's master forumula which explains everything?
12.26.18  8:50 am   In the time between putting the song up last week and putting the video up yesterday, did you make any changes in the mix?
12.26.18  8:11 am   How do you stop yourself from cancelling everything?
12.26.18  8:08 am   if a lotta people love each other the world would be a betteh place to live
12.26.18  7:56 am   What is your opinions about rock music? Do u like it? Or its just not your thing?
12.26.18  7:45 am   can i have the chords to "i just did a bad thing"?
12.26.18  6:42 am   Is toast real?
12.26.18  5:31 am   do you have a cure for boredom?
12.26.18  5:15 am   how do i get over a girl who really wasn't mine but she was the best thing i ever had
12.26.18  4:59 am   does it get boring to answer the same questions over and over again? (or am i underestimating the creativity of your fans)
12.26.18  4:27 am   Chopin or liszt and why
12.26.18  4:25 am   Is there a way for a person to live the same way and happily forever while resisting the forces of change and decay?

12.26.18  3:29 am   how come good things always end up bad and vice versa.

      like i literally figured it out if my day was good things are gonna go to shit pretty soon. if i had a shitty day i guarantee something good will happen. i know its probably all superstition but knowing this is stressing me out a lot.
12.26.18  3:15 am   Any chance on hi-res lossless versions of your songs?

12.26.18  2:09 am   if you don't want to put ads on your videos, why don't you sell songs on itunes?

i do

      or make an album?
12.26.18  2:06 am   how do you deal with feeling overwhelmed?

12.26.18  1:59 am   i must say that i think the "i just did a bad thing" videos is one of your strongest visual offerings. i listened to the song a *lot* in the week between when it came out and when the music video came out, and the video still managed to add to the thoughts the song generates in my brain. it was totally worth the extra week to make it the way that it ended up being.

Would you consider making the schedule more flexible to accommodate the extra time that ends up needing to go into certain things?

      You've mentioned things like releasing songs/videos on every other tuesday and anything videos on the other tuesday, but I would support a more low-key thing where the deadline was that you had to release *something* every tuesday,

      but depending on what ended up getting finished,

      it could either be a song, music video, and 30-second anything video, or just a 5-second anything video.
12.26.18  1:22 am   why do you try to make your songs as different as you can from each other?
12.26.18  1:10 am   How do I get over my social problems.
12.26.18  12:44 am   This new video is my favorite! Your mood in it however doesn't seem to match the theme of the song. Was that intentional?
12.26.18  12:19 am   tips for learning piano?
12.26.18  12:18 am   u ever start writing the 'next' song and it feel like ur still writing the 'same' song?
12.25.18  11:44 pm   how many answers do you know?

12.25.18  11:14 pm   do u love music?

      or do u do it bc ur good at it?
